STYLE.NAME: Standard American Lager
STYLE.NOTES: Standard American lager. Refreshing and thirst quenching beer. Mass market lager without any strong flavors or maltiness.
STYLE.PROFILE: Very light, with little or no malt aroma. Can be grainy, sweet or corn-like. Low bitterness and hop aroma. Color is pale to medium yelloe. No diacetyl. Highly carbonated.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: American hops, American or Pilsner Lager yeast, Pale two or six row malt. Frequently has up to 40% rice or corn adjuncts.
STYLE.EXAMPLES: Miller High Life. Budweiser, Kirin Lager, Molsen Golden, Corona Extra, Fosters Lager
